Introduction

Choi Min Hwan is a South Korean musician and actor under FNC Entertainment. He is a member of the boy band FTISLAND and its sub unit FT.triple.

He was married to Laboum's Yulhee from 2018-2023 and they have Three kids, two whom are twin girls.

active
